channel.title: Posts on Political families of Uttar Pradesh
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Political families of Uttar Pradesh

item.title: General elections 2019
item.description: GE 2019 summary Regressions % filter(year %!in% c(1974)) -- % mutate(contest_type_1 =case_when(position ==1 &dyn_cum ==0 ~1, -- % group_by( election_type,year,constituency_no) %% mutate(sum_cont_type = sum(contest_type_1)) %% mutate(contest_type =ifelse(sum_cont_type ==3, "non-fam v/s non-fam",ifelse(sum_cont_type ==5, "fam v/s non-fam", ifelse(sum_cont_type ==6, "non-fam v/s fam", ifelse(sum_cont_type ==8, "fam v/s fam", "NA"))))) -- % group_by( year,constituency_no) %% summarise(sum = sum(contest_type)) %%group_by(sum) %% summarise(n()) -- % filter(election_type =="AE") -- % filter(election_type =="GE") -- % select(State_Name, Constituency_No, Position,Poll_No, Turncoat) %% rename(turncoat_true = Turncoat) -- % filter(Vote_Share_Percentage 5) -- % filter(Vote_Share_Percentage 2) -- % filter(Vote_Share_Percentage 10) -- % filter(Vote_Share_Percentage 1) -- % replace_na("

item.title: NREGA Analysis
item.description: Constituency type experience caste Variable summary Workdays - total days worked under NREGS – Coded as: log(Workdays + 1) Worked - number of individuals who worked under NREGS – Coded as: log(Worked + 1) Deposits - sum of disbursements to laborers’ bank and post office accounts – Coded as: log(Bank Deposits + Post office Deposits + 1) Table 1: Summary of NREGA Year Total number of projects Total days Average days per project Average number of projects per constituency Average days per constituency 2009 85333 667898.

item.title: MPLADS Analyis
item.description: MPLADS Famil v/s Non-family Days Number of Projects Expenditure Experience categories Type of work v/s projects Type of work v/s cost cost categories MPLADS Famil v/s Non-family Table 1: MPLADS prjects and spending Type of constiuency Average number of contracts Avergae expenditure per project Non-family 321 348678 Family 433 318665 Table 2: MPLADS prjects and spending Year Type of constiuency Average number of contracts Avergae expenditure per project 2004 Family 332 294056 2004 Non-family 344 303096 2009 Family 521 340058 2009 Non-family 285 420557 The difference in the mean of both project count and the expenditure is statistically significant.

item.title: ADR Analysis
item.description: ADR Analysis Assets Family v/s non-family Experience v/s assets Asset growth over time Assets v/s caste Crime Political expereince Perfromance ADR Analysis Assets Family v/s non-family Experience v/s assets exp v/s caste v/s assets Asset growth over time GE Total assets Asset growth Movable assets Immovable assets AE Total assets Asset Growth Total Assets Movable assets Immovable assets Assets v/s caste Crime Political expereince Family caste v/s crime % mutate(crime_ser_d = if_else(serious_crime == 0,0,1)) -- % group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat,crime_ser_d) %% summarise(count = n()) %% group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat) %% mutate(sum= sum(count)) %% ungroup() %% mutate(prop= count/sum) %% -- % mutate(crime_non_ser_d = if_else(non_serious_crime == 0,0,1)) -- % group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat,crime_non_ser_d) %% summarise(count = n()) %% group_by(dyn_cum,fam_exp_cum_cat) %% mutate(sum= sum(count)) %% ungroup() %% mutate(prop= count/sum) %% -- Perfromance All elections Table 1: Average performance of MPs in the Parliament (trimmed mean) Entity Debates partcipated Proprtion of the sessions attended Questions asked Non-family 35.

item.title: Master file Analyis
item.description: Political Families Analysis goals Summary statistics Elections covered Basic eda Assembly Elections General Elections AE GE election contest local body elections Linkages Analyis at different levels All elections Land distribution Industries: Education Industries : Others caste Experience AE - GE Land distribution Industries: Education Industries : Others Caste Experience Local bodies Mid level Low level PRI’s ULB’s Fig 1 Political Families This data set knits the families of contestants in the elections held in Uttar Pradesh.
